name: Bones Whisper
description:
Bones Whisper is a fast flow focused platformer where you explore a hidden city of bones and discover the stories and woes of the inhabitants of this shrouded world. Movement and levels are fine tuned to allow for advanced movement options.

The Demo includes 3 levels the mountain pathway, the underground, and the city basement With many more planned for the future.

A controller is recommend with full support for Xbox one controllers and keyboard.

The game is great to speed run with tons of depth in the movement.

Inspirations

the game is inspired from some of my favorite games Hollow Knight and The Messenger. it is obvious the inspirations effects of the game with the lanterns and bouncing attacks for traversal and a bleak gothic setting. Bones Whisper does differ in one important way it is solely designed for movement in mind with more weighty momentum based movement, and the lack of combat.

Development

This is a passion project and is made in my free time hence the slow development. I plan to turn this game into a semi lengthy full game with replayability in mind.

I greatly appreciate any feedback I can get.
